SEARCH
Package com.mycompany.assignment

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.assignment.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
PayingCustomer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer who subscribes to magazines and supplements. Each customer has a name, email address, and lists of magazines and supplements they are subscribed to.
Author:
justin

    Constructs a Customer object with the specified name, email, list of magazines, and list of supplements.
